name: Drop The Soap
description:
A penguin was unjustly incarcerated and now you have to help him escape from the prison with just ... some soap!

Throw the soap at the guards to make them drop down and glide, then hit them with your pointy nose by gliding against them

COMMANDS:

WASD to move

SPACE to glide

LEFT CLICK of mouse to throw the soap

Made by Eggplant Brigade
